meanings.definition: The quality or state of being humorous or playful.
meanings.sent1: Her jokiness always lightens the mood in the room.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy his jokiness; it makes everyone smile.
meanings.sent3: The jokiness of the situation made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: His jokiness was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The jokiness of the clown entertained the children for hours.

meanings.definition: The tendency to make jokes or be lighthearted.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokiness had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist the jokiness in the air and joined in with a witty remark.
meanings.sent3: His jokiness at the party kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The jokiness in his tone made it clear he was in a good mood.
meanings.sent5: The jokiness of his nature made him a favorite among his friends.
